computations

Class ReduceWordlist

  • java.lang.Object
    • computations.ReduceWordlist

  • public class ReduceWordlist
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of functions which compute a list of rare words and return a HashMap with them included
    Author:
    karsten

      • absoluteValues

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> absoluteValues(SqlObject sql,
                                                                  long lower_frequency,
                                                                  long upper_frequency)
                                                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        AbsoluteValuesFunction returns hashmap with rare words depending on user-set limits
        Parameters:
        sql - which provides access to existing database
        lower_frequency - absolute value as lower limit for word frequency
        upper_frequency - absolute value as upper limit for word frequency
        Returns:
        Hashmap with rare words depending on input parameters
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if query fails

      • confidenceFunction

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> confidenceFunction(SqlObject sql,
                                                                      double percent)
                                                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Confidence-Function computes automatically lower and upper endpoint for word_frequency depending on input parameter percent returns complete hashmap of rare words
        Parameters:
        sql - objects which provides access to existing database system
        percent - percentage of whole dataset which will be returned
        Returns:
        Hashmap with rare words depending on input parameters
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if query fails

        NormalizeCompleteWordCount function gets complete wordcount and normalizes frequency-parameter
        Parameters:
        sql - objects which provides access to existing database system
        Returns:

        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if query fails
